articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Chad
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Chad
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on May 10 sent a congratulatory message to Idriss Deby Itno upon his reelection as president of the Republic of Chad.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests, wishing the president bigger successes in his responsible work for the country's socio-economic development and national unity.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., Lao People's Revolutionary Party
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., Lao People's Revolutionary Party
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Bounnang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, on May 10.
					 Bounnang Vorachith in his message extended warm congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the WPK on behalf of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and all the party members and on his own behalf.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the WPK is an expression of the boundless trust of the whole party and state, the entire army and all the people of the fraternal DPRK in him leading the cause of defending the country and building a thriving socialist nation by successfully carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders, the message noted.
					
					 It said:
					
					 I am firmly convinced that the fraternal Korean people would continue achieving fresher great successes in defending the country and building prosperous socialist Korea, guided by the Juche idea and Songun line, under the valiant leadership of the WPK headed by you.
					
					 Availing myself of this auspicious opportunity, I hope that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties, two countries and two peoples of Laos and the DPRK would continue developing.
					
					 I wish you good health and happiness and successes in your noble work.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from AINDF Central Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from AINDF Central Committee
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on May 10.
					 The letter said that Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the Workers' Party of Korea is a great auspicious event to be specially recorded in accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution and in the history of movement for national reunification.
					
					 The letter pointed out that his election as chairman of the WPK provided a sure guarantee for winning victories in the new historic advance for carrying out the nation's cause of independence and the cause of national reunification.
					
					 It said that he is a peerlessly great man and the bright sun of the 21st century as he is leading to victory the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of national reunification while demonstrating the dignity and the might of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea with his outstanding ideology, extraordinary leadership and noble virtue.
					
					 It noted that today the vanguard fighters and patriotic people from all walks of life in the south are full of enthusiasm to more dynamically wage the movement for national reunification under his leadership with the happiness and pride of having him in the van of the national cause of independence.
					
					 It vowed to make all-out efforts to take as important guidelines the Juche-oriented line, policies, proposals and ways for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and devotedly carry out them.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on May 10.
					The letter said that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK is a clear manifestation of the absolute support, trust and boundless loyalty of all the Korean people to him and a striking demonstration of the unbreakable unity and cohesion of all the service personnel and people rallied close around him.
					
					The letter extended the greatest glory and the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK and kind-hearted father of the overseas Koreans, reflecting the unanimous loyalty of all the Koreans in China.
					
					The report on the review of the work of the Central Committee of the WPK made by Kim Jong Un at its 7th Congress serves as an encyclopedic immortal programme that gave perfect answers to all the questions arising in bringing about prosperity of Juche Korea and accomplishing the great cause of national reunification and the cause of global independence, the letter noted.
					
					All the Koreans in China will become manifold shields and fortress overseas devotedly safeguarding Kim Jong Un, heaven and destiny of the 80 million Koreans, bearing deep in mind the great pride and self-esteem as being members of the nation of the sun, the letter said.
					
					It stressed that the Koreans in China will actively join the motherland, which is demonstrating its might as a politico-ideological power, military power and youth power, in its dynamic advance of the movement for creating the speed of Mallima to rank itself among economic powers and highly civilized powers as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Organizations and Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Organizations, Personages
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from foreign organizations and personages Thursday on the occasion of his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among them were the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women, Gunma Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity, Osvaldo Larriva Alvarado, chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, and Julio Ballesteros Espin, chairman of the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People.

articles.title: Social Science Seminar Held to Observe Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work
articles.content:
Social Science Seminar Held to Observe Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- There took place a social science seminar at the Academy of Social Sciences on Thursday to mark the 50th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "On Correctly Preserving the National Characteristics of the Korean Language".
					 The seminar heard papers explaining the historic position and vitality of the work in the Juche-oriented development of the Korean language and the issues arising in improving the linguistic culture as required by the building of a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 The speakers said the President's work served as an important document which uniquely clarified the main orientation and ways of building the national language, the most important issue in settling the matter of national language in the era of independence.
					
					 Vocabulary rearrangement is a purposeful and conscious work of the popular masses to do away with unnecessary words of foreign origin left over by the old eras in all fields of language and linguistic culture, preserve the originality and achieve independent development of the national language, they noted.
					
					 They referred to the important requirement for learning from the popular style of writing of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They underlined the need to develop linguistic culture in the society in a more ennobling and civilized manner as required by the times when a highly civilized socialist nation is being built.
					
					 Present at the seminar were officials concerned, teachers and researchers in the fields of science and education and media persons.

articles.title: Malaysian Embassy Officials Do Friendship Labor
articles.content:
Malaysian Embassy Officials Do Friendship Labor
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Malaysian Ambassador to the DPRK Mohammad Nizan Bin Mohammad and his embassy officials did friendship labor at the DPRK-Malaysia Friendship Ponghwa Co-op Farm in Kangdong County, Pyongyang on Thursday.
					 They looked round the room dedicated to the history of the farm, being briefed on the leadership feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They helped farmers in weeding vegetable field.

articles.title: Drama "Blood Vessel" Created in DPRK
articles.content:
Drama "Blood Vessel" Created in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- The newly-created drama "Blood Vessel" is on stage at the National Theatre in Pyongyang, the DPRK.
					 The drama deals with the struggle of the workers of the Sangwon Cement Complex for devotedly fulfilling the increased production assignments allocated by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It shows well the noble ideological and spiritual world of the Korean people who are displaying the spirit of self-reliance and self-development, intimately linked with the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The drama is consisted of eight scenes and involving famous actors and actresses.

articles.title: Breeding Tilapia in Seawater Succeeded
articles.content:
Breeding Tilapia in Seawater Succeeded
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- The Kamapho Fishery Station in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has recently succeeded in habituating tilapia to seawater.
					 The station built seawater fish ponds covering 10 hectares and bred omnivorous and highly-productive tilapia fries in the ponds to a degree of 180g in 100 days.
					
					 It formed a food-chain in the ponds by cultivating tilapia at its upper layer and planting shellfish at its bottom.
					
					 The station settled various sci-tech problems and used natural and assorted food in breeding tilapia.

articles.title: DPRK Youths Favor Kim Jong Un's Election as WPK Chairman
articles.content:
DPRK Youths Favor Kim Jong Un's Election as WPK Chairman
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Youth and students in the DPRK are delightful at the news that the dear respected Kim Jong Un was elected as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea at its Seventh Congress.
					 Han Song Guk, a student of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 We, students, would like to extend highest respects and warmest congratulations to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 His election to the top post of the WPK is a great national event as it guarantees the rosy future and prosperity of Juche Korea. And it is a high honor of all the youths.
					
					 I will study harder to be a scientist faithful to the leadership of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is turning the country into a socialist power of Juche, true to the behests of the great leaders.
					
					 Yun Kwang Il, chairman of the Phyongwon County Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said:
					
					 The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK is an expression of our army's, people's and youths' absolute support and deep trust in him who has led the Songun revolution to victory.
					
					 He put forward us, youths, as reserve forces, advancing group and wing of the WPK. Under his guidance, legendary tales about heroic youths have been created and Songun Korea is displaying its dignity as a youth power.
					
					 I will prepare myself as a competent teacher and a field instructor of the youth revolutionary school which trains the staunch fighters for carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Absurd Accusations against DPRK's Just Measures for Self-defence
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Absurd Accusations against DPRK's Just Measures for Self-defence
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. keeps making absurd accusations against the DPRK's just measures for self-defence. 
					 Of late mandarins of the White House and the U.S. State Department spouted out the gibberish that the DPRK's development of nuclear weapons and their delivery system were a provocation causing regional instability and it should honor its commitments and duties.
					
					 This is just like a thief shouting "Stop the thief!"
					
					 No matter how noisily the U.S. may trumpet about "north Korea's threat and provocation," the U.S. can never deny the justice of the DPRK's measure of bolstering up the nuclear force as it is a just measure to protect the sovereign right of the country and nation from the U.S. moves to stifle it.
					
					 The U.S. singled out "toppling the social system" in the DPRK" as one of the major phases for carrying out the strategy for world domination already several decades ago and has since worked hard to implement it.
					
					 In 2000 the U.S. drew up a timetable for virtual "collapse," predicting the Korean peninsula would be unified by south Korea in 2015 and has since extremely escalated the nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					
					 Last year Obama made the provocative remarks that it was necessary to bring down north Korea as soon as possible and pushed the situation on the peninsula to the brink of a war. This was a direct product of the U.S. hostile policy to enslave the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK have reached such a dangerous phase as openly disclosing the scenarios for aggression and preemptive attack on the latter by staging the largest-ever joint military drills Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16.
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. is the chieftain of aggression and disturber of peace and security as it has gravely violated the sovereignty and vital right of the DPRK and the Korean nation for the past several decades.
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to cope with the U.S. nuclear war moves by bolstering up its nuclear force both in quality and quantity as the U.S. is focusing all its forces on bringing down the DPRK by physical means.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which should be brought to justice for reneging on its commitments and duties.
					
					 The DPRK has made every possible effort to realize the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula, pursuant to the September 19 joint statement adopted at the 4th round of the six-party talks.
					
					 On Oct. 15, 2008 the U.S. magazine News Week, referring to the DPRK's efforts for denuclearization, said that one may say that the sincerity on the part of north Korea was proven for sure. 
					
					 The U.S., however, resorted to undisguised hostile military acts and threats to the DPRK, totally breaching the basic idea of the September 19 joint statement in which the former promised to respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and peacefully co-exist with it and it declared it has no intention to attack or invade the DPRK with nuclear or conventional weapons.
					
					 Moreover, the U.S. categorically refused to fulfill all its commitments such as provision of light water reactors and energy to the DPRK and promise to opt for building lasting peace-keeping mechanism on the peninsula.
					
					 The September 19 joint statement much touted by the hostile forces was thus finally scrapped by the U.S.
					
					 Even at this moment the U.S. is busy massively introducing all types of modern military hardware into south Korea and its vicinity to stifle the dignified DPRK at any cost and getting frantic with the "human rights" and "sanctions" rackets.
					
					 The DPRK will react to the U.S. hostile moves with tougher countermeasures. 
					
					 The hostile forces' desperate moves against the DPRK would only cause it to remarkably bolster up its nuclear attack capability.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Tasks Advanced by Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing Tasks Advanced by Seventh Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday editorially calls for rallying close around Marshal Kim Jong Un and emerging victors in the struggle to carry out the tasks advanced by the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The basic spirit of the party congress is to launch a general offensive and all-out death-defying campaign on the self-development-first principle, holding aloft the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and thus bring earlier the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution. 
					
					 "Let the whole party, the entire army and all the people go all out for the implementation of the tasks advanced at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea to hasten the final victory of the Juche revolution!" This is the slogan the party, army and people should hold high in their struggle.
					
					 The WPK and the Korean people have honorable yet important duty to launch a general offensive to implement the grand programme unrolled at the party congress under the unfurled banner of uninterrupted revolution.
					
					 Very huge are the tasks of the revolution and vicious are the hostile forces' moves, but there are neither difficulties insurmountable nor fortress unconquerable for us when we buckle down to our drive with a will. 
					
					 We are under the tested guidance of the party and have a precious history and tradition of self-reliance and self-development and a mighty weapon of unbreakable single-minded unity.
					
					 Only victory and glory are always in store for our revolution as there are invincible guidance of the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party and the servicepersons and people ready to promptly respond to the party's call.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blames U.S. for Sparking Nuclear Arms Race Again
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blames U.S. for Sparking Nuclear Arms Race Again
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, The New York Times claimed that Washington's strategic weapons modernization program is one of the reasons why Russia and China were compelled to increase the funds for developing nuclear weapons and such arms buildup is reviving the arms race dating back to the Cold War era, upsetting the equilibrium of forces among big powers and, furthermore, creating the danger of a nuclear war. 
					 Meanwhile, Ta Kung Pao, the newspaper of Hong Kong, China, recently conveyed the news that the U.S. and Russia have buckled down upon the development of smaller nuclear weapons of the new generation, expressing concern over the fact that nuclear arms race such as that dating back to the Cold War era may kick off. 
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 As media unanimously comment, the nuclear arms race among major nuclear powers has already become a reality and the U.S. is chiefly to blame for this.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear weapons modernization poses a serious threat to the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK knows very well how to deal with the U.S. which denies the former's ideology and social system and refuses to coexist with it. 
					
					 The DPRK will steadily bolster up its nuclear arsenal no matter how the world may change and as long as the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK remains unchanged.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop at once its nuclear weapons modernization and reckless saber-rattling, bearing in mind its strategy of nuclear monopoly is no more than a daydream.

articles.title: Federation of Koreans in the U.S. Supports Policy of National Reunification Set Forth at Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Federation of Koreans in the U.S. Supports Policy of National Reunification Set Forth at Seventh Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. made a statement on May 10 in support of the policy of the country's reunification supreme leader Kim Jong Un set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The country's reunification is the desire of all Koreans and the policy of the country's reunification set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK is in line with the ardent aspiration of the nation.
					
					 The Korean nation has the wounds resulting from the division and confrontation with compatriots caused by the unreasonable interference by outside forces not healed yet.
					
					 There should not be any more war on this land and the north and the south should get united without fail in order to achieve peaceful reunification.
					
					 Achieving national independence, great national unity and peace and realizing federal formula are a reasonable proposal acceptable to any Korean and a universally accepted offer which the progressives of the world can support.
					
					 The Korean nation has such great reunification programmes as the July 4 joint statement and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The statement fully supported and approved the policy of the country's reunification which reflects the nation's will of opposing a war and hoping for independent reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish" was carried by the Indonesian newspaper International Daily on May 4.
					 The work, published on May 5, Juche 80 (1991), deals with the inevitability of victory of socialism, firmness of our socialism, secret of its invincibility and intrinsic character of our socialism.

articles.title: 7th Congress of WPK Observed by Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
7th Congress of WPK Observed by Foreign Political Parties
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Events were held by foreign political parties on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included a book exhibition by the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, meetings, photo exhibitions and film shows by the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar on May 2 and 5.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and publications introducing Juche Korea.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched the Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea Held in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria said that the 7th Congress of the WPK would be of great historic significance in developing the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and bringing earlier the final victory for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation noted the 7th Congress of the WPK drew the world attention.
					
					 The secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar stressed that the WPK and the Korean people would certainly build a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Russia.

articles.title: WPK's History of Victory Introduced by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
WPK's History of Victory Introduced by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups between April 28 and May 4 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Russian newspaper Za Narodnuyu Blastsi carried an article titled "Brilliant course" illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It said the WPK has covered the path of victory and glory for over 70 years and that the DPRK is vigorously advancing toward an economic power and highly civilized socialist nation under his leadership.
					
					 The Pakistani newspaper Kuweta Daily Independent said in an article titled "Will of WPK" that the WPK has made an immortal contribution to the cause of the popular masses for independence and socialism.
					
					 The Syrian newspapers Al Baath, Al Thawrah and Al Nour carried special write-ups introducing the proud history of the WPK.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Party Sends Solidarity to 7th Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Party Sends Solidarity to 7th Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru issued a statement on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The  7th Congress of the WPK will pave a bright way for the world people to dynamically advance toward socialism, the unique road of social justice and freedom against U.S. imperialism.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the peerless heroes of Mt. Paektu being praised as the sun of humankind, the WPK has grown stronger to be a powerful political force giving a strong impetus to the struggle of the world oppressed people for independence.
					
					 The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru extends fraternal solidarity to the 7th Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Send back Abductees of DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Send back Abductees of DPRK 
 Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "Allured and abducted female citizens should be immediately sent back" on May 3.
					 The article said:
					
					 World public is growing vocal censuring the south Korean authorities' group allurement and abduction of DPRK's citizens.
					
					 Not content with their group allurement and abduction, the south Korean authorities are viciously conducting an operation to pressurize them into "defection."
					
					 The recent incident was a premeditated and organized atrocity committed by gangsters of the Intelligence Service (IS) at the instruction of the south Korean authorities, unjustifiable international terrorism and a wanton encroachment upon the DPRK's dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 There is opinion even in south Korea that the organizer of the recent group allurement and abduction was Chongwadae and gangster-like group of the IS.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should immediately give up their far-fetched assertion to justify their unethical abduction and reckless hooliganism and send back the female citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 They should, at the same time, take prompt technical measures to enable families of abductees to go to Seoul and meet them face to face and bring them back.

articles.title: Tiene lugar seminario del sector de ciencias sociales
articles.content:
Tiene lugar seminario del sector de ciencias sociales
Pyongyang, 12 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 12 en la Academia de Ciencias Sociales el seminario del sector de ciencias sociales por el 50o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Sobre el desarrollo acertado de las caracteristicas nacionales del idioma coreano".
					En la ocasion fueron publicadas las tesis explicando la posicion historica de la obra en el desarrollo autoctono del idioma coreano y su vitalidad y los problemas que se presentan en desarrollar mas la vida linguistica conforme a la demanda de la construccion del pais civilizado socialista.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que la obra del Presidente es el documento programatico que dilucido originalmente el rumbo principal y los remedios de la construccion de la lengua nacional, asuntos importantisimos en la solucion del problema de lengua nacional de la epoca de la independencia.
					
					La purificacion del vocabulario es la labor consciente de las masas populares para eliminar los innecesarios extranjerismos dejados en el lenguaje y todas las esferas de la vida linguistica por la epoca vieja, preservar la pureza de la lengua nacional y lograr su desarrollo independiente, senalaron.
					
					Y refirieron a la importante demanda en aprender el modo popular de escribir y hablar del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Enfatizaron en la necesidad de desarrollar de manera mas culta la vida linguistica de la sociedad segun la demanda de la epoca en construccion del pais civilizado socialista.
					
					A la ocasion asistieron los funcionarios de la rama interesada, los profesores, investigadores, periodistas y redactores de los dominios de ciencias, educacion y prensa e informacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a levantarse en materializacion de tareas de VII Congreso
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a levantarse en materializacion de tareas de VII Congreso 
Pyongyang, 12 de mayo (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico el dia 12 el editorial exhortando a todos, unidos firmemente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, a exaltar el honor de triunfadores en la lucha por materializar las tareas presentadas por el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  El espiritu principal de dicho Congreso reside en adelantar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche al desarrollar la ofensiva general y la lucha decisiva poniendo de manifiesto el espiritu de conceder la primacia al autofortalecimiento enarbolando la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.
					
					  "!Adelantamos la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche mediante un vigoroso avance de todo el partido, ejercito y pueblo para materializar las tareas presentadas en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea!", esto es la consigna de lucha a ser mantenida por nuestro Partido, ejercito y pueblo.
					
					  En la actualidad ante nuestro Partido y pueblo se presenta el deber honroso e importante de desarrollar con audacia la ofensiva general para materializar el gran programa presentado por el VII Congreso del PTC enarbolando la bandera de la revolucion continua.
					
					Son muy enormes las tareas revolucionarias y son perversas las maniobras de las fuerzas hostiles. Pero, si luchamos con la firme determinacion no tendremos la dificultad insuperable ni la meta inconquistable.
					
					Tenemos la probada direccion del Partido, la preciosa historia y tradicion del autofortalecimiento y el arma poderosa de la unidad monolitica inquebrantable con nada.
					
					Por contar con la direccion invencible del gran Partido Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista y los militares y civiles que apoyan fielmente la direccion del Partido, habra solo la victoria y gloria en el avance de nuestra revolucion.
